description: Multi sectoral referral and psychosocial support; This is the main helpline number to call and has been/being circulated nationwide.
Immediate services to police and hospitals.
Immediate reports/help for any social problems from enquiring after COVID-19.

organization: National Helpline Center for Violence Against Women
description: Immediate service to victims and links up to relevant agencies: doctors, counselors, lawyers, DNA experts, police officers.
Legal assistance, emergency shelter, and mental healthcare.

organization: Friendship Bangladesh Based in Cox's Bazar
description: Advice on primary healthcare, SGBV, and psychosocial support.
Provides information and advice about allowances and grants.
